ygData.subject: Re: Introductions - Hello Everyone!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well that s both confusing and disappointing. Perhaps EQ shouldn t have named the servers after things in game =( ... Maybe we should do that, but I am
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 5 Jul 1999 20:26:26 Sirenia wrote:
>From: "Sirenia" <paladin@...>
>
>Hello Shalka.
>
>Just to clarify... unfortunately, I am on the "Rathe Server". Perhaps there was confusion in this because I signed off as "Priestess of Tunare", the goddess not the server... sorry. =( It would be
Well that's both confusing and disappointing. Perhaps EQ shouldn't have named the servers after things in game =(

>nice if we all were on the same server though, but there seems to be quite a variety so far. The idea of all of us attempting a new server would be a fabulous idea if everyone is in agreement.

Maybe we should do that, but I am loathe to give up my character and friends....

Pix/Shalka/Megan
